DOC.brief_summary: This randomise observational phase 1 study 48 healthy volunteer age 18-50 . The study assess safety immunogenicity viral vectored vaccine ChAdOx1 NP+M1 MVA NP+M1 heterologous prime-boost regimen . A crossover design allow comparison two vaccine . Volunteers divide 4 group ( n=12 group ) . Groups recruit simultaneously control seasonal change influenza . This certain time year likely higher naturally acquire T cell response influenza time due circulate influenza virus community . The study extend include 2 additional group ( group 5 & 6 ) , contain 12 healthy adult age 50 year . Group 5 receive ChAdOx 1 NP+M1 day 0 , group 6 receive additional boost MVA-NP+M1 8 week later .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Candidate Influenza Vaccines MVA-NP+M1 ChAdOx1 NP+M1
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Groups 14 The volunteer must satisfy follow criterion eligible study : Healthy adult age 18 50 year Able willing ( Investigator 's opinion ) comply study requirement Willing allow investigator discuss volunteer 's medical history General Practitioner For female , willingness practice continuous effective contraception study negative pregnancy test day ( ) vaccination Agreement refrain blood donation course study Provide write informed consent Exclusion Criteria Groups 14 The volunteer may enter study follow apply : Participation another research study involve investigational product 30 day precede enrolment , plan use study period Previous receipt recombinant adenoviral recombinant MVA vectored vaccine Administration immunoglobulins and/or blood product within three month precede plan administration vaccine candidate Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient state , include HIV infection ; asplenia ; recurrent , severe infection chronic ( 14 day ) immunosuppressant medication within past 6 month ( inhaled/topical steroid allow ) History allergic disease reaction likely exacerbate component vaccine Any history anaphylaxis surface ( HBsAg ) hepatitis C virus ( antibody HCV ) Pregnancy , lactation willingness/intention become pregnant study Any significant disease , disorder finding ( include blood test result ) , ,
